==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈkaɪ̯nə/}} * {{audio|de|De-keine.ogg|Audio}} ===Article=== {{head|de|article|negative indefinite article}} # accusative and nominative feminine and plural forms of [[kein]] (''not a''). #: {{ux|de|Das ist '''keine''' Lampe.|That is not a lamp.}} #: {{ux|de|[[Elemente]] [[sind]] [[Stoffe]], [[die]] [[in]] '''keine''' [[einfacheren]] Stoffe [[zerlegt]] [[werden]] [[können]].|[[element|Elements]] [[are]] [[substances]] [[that]] [[can]]'''not''' [[be]] [[decomposed]] [[into]] '''any''' [[simpler]] [[substances]].}} {{de-decl-kein}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|de|pronoun form}} # [[none]], not [[any]], [[neither]] (feminine and plural form of [[keiner]]) #: {{ux|de|Von den Lösungen ist '''keine''' korrekt.|Of the solutions, none is correct.}} ====Related terms==== [[kein]], [[keinen]], [[keiner]], [[keines]], [[keinem]] ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
